com.lsc.ctesterapi

Class Logger

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lsc.ctesterfx.logger.AbstractLogger
      • com.lsc.ctesterapi.Logger

  • public class Logger
extends com.lsc.ctesterfx.logger.AbstractLogger
    Class used to log information in the screen and in the log file.
    Author:
    dma@logossmartcard.com

      • newInstance

        public static Logger newInstance()

      • log

        public void log(String text)
        Logs general information. The text will be printed as it is received plus a new line.
        Specified by:
        log in class com.lsc.ctesterfx.logger.AbstractLogger
        Parameters:
        text: - text to be printed.

      • logComment

        public void logComment(String text)
        Logs comments. The text will be appended to the string "// " and a new line will be added.
        Specified by:
        logComment in class com.lsc.ctesterfx.logger.AbstractLogger
        Parameters:
        text: - text to be printed as a comment.

      • logError

        public void logError(String text)
        Logs errors. Special type of comment that gets printed in RED and with the label "[ERROR]" at the beginning.
        Specified by:
        logError in class com.lsc.ctesterfx.logger.AbstractLogger
        Parameters:
        text: - text to be printed as an error.

      • logWarning

        public void logWarning(String text)
        Logs warnings. Special type of comment that gets printed in YELLOW and with the label "[ERROR]" at the beginning.
        Specified by:
        logWarning in class com.lsc.ctesterfx.logger.AbstractLogger
        Parameters:
        text: - text to be printed as a warning.

      • logDebug

        public void logDebug(String text)
        Logs debug information. Meaning that it will only be printed in the screen and not in the file.
        Specified by:
        logDebug in class com.lsc.ctesterfx.logger.AbstractLogger
        Parameters:
        text: - text to be printed.

      • logSuccess

        public void logSuccess(String text)
        Logs a succesful message. Special type of comment that gets printed in GREEN and with the label "[SUCCESS]" at the beginning.
        Specified by:
        logSuccess in class com.lsc.ctesterfx.logger.AbstractLogger
        Parameters:
        text: - text to be printed.
